description: This French classic is easy to rustle up from a few store, cupboard and fridge essentials.
name: Cherry & Almond Clafoutis Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 440g pitted black cherries, drained from syrup

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180°C (Gas 4). Butter a 28 x 20 x 5cm ovenproof dish.

Place the eggs and vanilla sugar or caster sugar in a large bowl and whisk with an electric hand-held whisk until light and fluffy, then fold in the flour. Pour in the melted butter and whisk until well combined. Add the milk and stir well.
Arrange the cherries in the ovenproof dish and pour the batter over. Sprinkle the almonds on top and place the dish on a baking tray.
Bake the clafoutis for 30-35 minutes, until risen and golden brown. Dust with icing sugar and serve with whipped cream.
